verbs.description: [V: snickerdoodle] [ARG1: cheesecake] my maternal grandmother preferred sewing and quilting to cooking and baking but there were some things that she cooked and baked really well she was the only person i knew who made snickerdoodles i always enjoyed these simple but yummy cookies since cheesecake is my very favorite dessert i could n't resist coming up with one that recreates those flavors i think of my grandmother each time i make it sometimes i 'll drizzle the slices with maple syrup —lisa varner el paso texas cheesecake snickerdoodle cheesecake
